docs.snippet: A nasty storm system that has pelted homes and cars with hail up to the size of a baseball in the central Plains and caused flash floods is expected to bring high winds, more hail and possible tornadoes to the Ohio Valley on Wednesday, forecasters...
docs.lead_paragraph: A nasty storm system that has pelted homes and cars with hail up to the size of a baseball in the central Plains and caused flash floods is expected to bring high winds, more hail and possible tornadoes to the Ohio Valley on Wednesday, forecasters said.

headline.main: Storm System Moves East After Battering Central United States

docs.snippet: Donovan Solano hit a three-run homer off David Price to help the Miami Marlins beat Tampa Bay 5-3 on Wednesday night, extending the Rays' longest losing streak in nearly five years to nine games. It is the second-longest losing streak in the major...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donovan Solano hit a three-run homer off David Price to help the Miami Marlins beat Tampa Bay 5-3 on Wednesday night, extending the Rays' longest losing streak in nearly five years to nine games. It is the second-longest losing streak in the major leagues this season.

headline.main: Solano's 3-Run Homer Helps Marlins Beat Rays 5-4

docs.abstract: Louisville, Kentucky’s largest city, is undergoing renovation and construction boom that includes hotels, residences, entertainment outlets and fine dining; City Properties Group, which completed Louisville Slugger factory and museum project in 1996, is undertaking major new construction in city's downtown area.
